Class DungeonCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • DungeonCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Hero, Monster

    public abstract class DungeonCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable
    Abstract Base class for inheritance hierarchy for a role playing game

    • Constructor Detail

      • DungeonCharacter

        public DungeonCharacter(java.lang.String name,
                        int hitPoints,
                        int attackSpeed,
                        double chanceToHit,
                        int damageMin,
                        int damageMax)
        Full constructor to initialize a dungeon character
        Parameters:
        name - the character name
        hitPoints - the number of hit points the character has
        attackSpeed - the character's attack speed
        chanceToHit - the character's chance to land a hit
        damageMin - the character's minimum damage
        damageMax - the character's maximum damage

        Parameters:
        o - the object to compare with
        Returns:
        int the value 1

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Get the name of a DungeonCharacter object
        Returns:
        String the character's name

      • getHitPoints

        public int getHitPoints()
        Get the hit points of a Dungeon character object
        Returns:
        int the character's hit points

      • getAttackSpeed

        public int getAttackSpeed()
        Get the attack speed of a DungeonCharacter object
        Returns:
        int the character's attack speed

      • addHitPoints

        public void addHitPoints(int hitPoints)
        addHitPoints is used to increment the hitpoints a dungeon character has
        Parameters:
        hitPoints - the number of hit points to add

      • subtractHitPoints

        public void subtractHitPoints(int hitPoints)
        subtractHitPoints is used to decrement the hitpoints a dungeon character has. It also reports the damage and remaining hit points
        Parameters:
        hitPoints - the number of hit points to subtract

      • isAlive

        public boolean isAlive()
        isAlive is used to see if a character is still alive by checking hit points
        Returns:
        boolean True if the DungeonCharacter is alive, False if not

      • attack

        public void attack(DungeonCharacter opponent)
        attack allows character to attempt attack on opponent. First, chance to hit is considered. If a hit can occur, then the damage is calculated based on character's damage range. This damage is then applied to the opponenet.
        Parameters:
        opponent - the DungeonCharacter object that is being attacked
